ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Digest Number 319
ygData.msgSnippet: Aiyah, tell your wife that the family that plays together stays together mah. Then you can play long long no worry. Oso got wife partner playing next to your
ygData.messageBody:
Aiyah, tell your wife that 'the family that plays together stays together' mah.
Then you can play long long no worry. Oso got wife partner playing next to
your char somemore.

At 10:34 AM 9/9/2000 +0000, you wrote:

> Date: Sat, 9 Sep 2000 11:58:52 +0800
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>Subject: RE: Ziltus! we wanted a LAN gaming table!!! Hehehehe
>
>Thx to Garren and Tri for the blessings. I might be cutting my gaming a
>bit but dun worry I cut down too much. My wife already know my style many
>yrs ago and as long as I dun overplay, she won't nag at me, hehe. Frankly
>speaking, I really think we shld come out for a gathering every now and
>then, like my UO kakis (some also in D2 and EQ). Even it's just a coffee
>talk-cock-sing-song session, it will help to bring us closer and understand
>one another.
